Interface IUFkEvent

All Known Implementing Classes:
IUFkForestJPanel.IUFkEventImpl
public interface IUFkEvent

an Interface for observing union events

Author:
Yossi Naor & Yosi Zilberberg

Method Detail

union

void union(int fromLeafId,
           int intoLeafId,
           int fromRootId,
           int intoRootId)
Union Event for cases 1+3

Parameters:
fromLeafId - selected leaf id from source tree
intoLeafId - selected leaf id from destination tree
fromRootId - root id in the source tree (to be disposed)
intoRootId - root id in the destination tree

union

void union(int leaf1Id,
           int leaf2Id,
           int newRootId,
           int rootChildId1,
           int rootChildId2)
Union Event for case 2

Parameters:
leaf1Id - selected leaf id from source tree 1
leaf2Id - selected leaf id from source tree 2
newRootId - new root id for managing both trees
rootChildId1 - root id for tree 1 (to be a NonRoot element)
rootChildId2 - root id for tree 2 (to be a NonRoot element)
